page.title: 19Clothes
page.content: At our school we don't wear school uniform at all but we have to wear sensible clothes. Girls might wear a dark skirt and a blouse and jersey to go with it. The boys mostly wear corduroy trousers. They hardly ever wear shorts and then only in the summer. They wear a tee shirt with a jersey on top and trainers on their feet. When I go out to play I put on jeans, an old jersey and sandshoes. When I am going out somewhere special I put on my good clothes such as my pink suit and a cardigon. When the boys go out they wear a shirt and a tie and good corduroy trousers with an anorak on top. At night the girls wear nighties in the summer and in the winter pyjamas but the boys always wear pyjamas all the year round.
